Articles.Content:
Thanks. Is all I need to say. Keeping KSP true blue. Ignoring nay sayers like a boss.

You all can count on my buying expansions packs to keep you guys afloat. It's the least I can do.

Your fan

John

I agree with John. I was so excited when 0.20 came out, and I don't mind the few small bugs I've encountered. I'm so glad you released it when you did, and all I can say is: keep up the good work, SQUAD!
Party up in this here rocketisle
I will personally buy anything necessary to keep KSP afloat, and then some! Keep on Squad!
If I won the lottery (not that I could since im only 13) if give it all to Squad

If I won the lottery (not that I could since im only 13) if give it all to Squad

Well, I'd take care of my car, and college bills, then I'd make a mega donation. Under only one condition... I receive a life size, super detailed statue of Jeb. lol
I might not give them all my money, but I'd def play ksp while chillin on the space station, can't cost that much to rent a space right?

I also agree with John... This game has not only captured my imagination but has already exceeded Skyrim as the top game played on my Steam, 150 hours so far, and I only started playing at the start of 0.19. Absolutely fantastic value for money. I will gladly pay for expansions to support further development. My only wish is there are more developers like Squad in the world, you guys are doing a fantastic job.
My only wish is for you guys to keep the difficulty as it is, or higher, No easy crap. Even if we ask for it. Ignore us if we become dumb. You guys do what you know is right.

My only wish is for you guys to keep the difficulty as it is, or higher, No easy crap.

You know, I was thinking the other day what the game would be like if Squad implemented different difficulty levels. Like "Novice" for people just learning to play the game and then "Normal" and "Scott Manley" modes.

I also agree with this thread, more money to SQUAD! I feel like cheating them by paying only what I did for such a great entertainment. I have been playing CPU games way to much in my life and I have lost countless hours on games that gave me mild amusement at best. KSP now is a completely different story, I have NEVER laught out loud (litteraly) so much while playing a game. Whener my "brillant" design colapses in a deadly ball of fire, or my extactic Kerbal's face suddendly changes to panic just has my plane is starting to spin out of control it amuses me so much I am worried about my mental health.

There should be a way to donate to SQUAD!
Ahhhhh, hugs for all

Buy the game?

Buy it for your friends. Buy it for your family.

Buy KSP for charity.
Kerbal Space Program is amazing. It's just great and provides endless amounts of fun.

I'm kinda sad I bought the game before the May 1 deadline. I automatically get all the updates and for free. My pocket book is happy, but, kind of a hit on Squad.

This is an AWESOME game Squad. I'd say don't change a thing, but, we want MOAR FUHN!! {big grin}

I've actually bought the game twice. Once directly from Squad over a year ago and again recently through Steam when it showed up on early access. So I'm trying to support you guys where I can. Thanks for letting me blow things up in entertaining ways!
I hadn't thought about having two keys. I might look into that.

Id buy expansion/DLC's aswell if they ever came about. I love KSP and feel I that purchasing it back when it was .17 was beyond worth it. Outstanding work Squad. Ignore the whiners and keep on doing what your doing how YOU feel it should be done.
Thank you for the hours that I have lost playing with my "legos with rocket fuel."

I actually thought a bit about how difficulty would work in this. Maybe "easy mode" would reduce inter-part force by half (i.e. it would require twice as much torque or sheer stress to break a connection). Or maybe such a thing would just be 50% more fuel in parts or something.

Either way, I'm fine without it.

100% agreed! Squad is kicking *ss and taking names with this game! Keep it up guys! Going by your track record so far, I have high hopes for what you might be planning for paid DLC (if any). I'll be among the first to throw down for it, guaranteed!!

Joining the "Squad Rules!!" CJ I'm happy to support in any way I can but if you need a cash infusion, may I suggest adding kerbalizer support into the next release? I'd happily throw down a few bucks for me to fly with custom kerbals
